item.description: http://www.wrko.com/a... Join WRKO and Donald Rumsfeld for a once-in-a-lifetime speaking engagement as the former Secretary of Defense discusses the events of September 11th and the responsibility of protecting our nation. As the author of Known and Unknown, Mr. Rumsfeld not only chronicles his life as a public servant, but provides insight into previously undisclosed details of the United States government that few Americans can offer. At the end of the event, attendees will have the chance to participate in a question and answer session with Mr. Rumsfeld.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: An Evening with Rumsfeld hosted by WRKO talking about 9/11-tix $50
